item.title: Similarity Measurement in Image Retrieval
item.description: For image retrieval and other similarity-based tasks such as [person re-identification](https://arxiv.org/abs/1610.02984), we need to compute the similarity (or distance) between the query image and database images. Then we can rank the database images based on their similarity to the query image. In this post, I want to briefly introduce two measures widely used in image retrieval tasks.
